problem.title: Data Overflow, Insight Deficit
problem.subtitle: Capital-intensive industries generate massive data volumes but lack integrated tools to transform fragmented information into strategic competitive advantages.

fragmentedSystems.title: Fragmented Systems
fragmentedSystems.description: Financial, Environmental, and Social data trapped in isolated silos, preventing holistic strategic planning and integrated decision-making

hiddenRisks.title: Hidden Risks
hiddenRisks.description: Stranded assets, regulatory risks (CSRD, EU Taxonomy), and environmental liabilities invisible in traditional financial calculations

suboptimalDecisions.title: Suboptimal Decisions
suboptimalDecisions.description: Missing integration of externalities and sustainability factors leads to reduced long-term profitability and competitive disadvantage

problem.resultMessage: Result: Suboptimal decisions, elevated risks, and missed opportunities in a rapidly changing regulatory landscape

solution.title: EROI: The Unifying Force
solution.subtitle: Our proprietary Environmental Return on Investment methodology quantifies environmental impact in financial terms, integrating sustainability as a unified discipline in all strategic decisions.
solution.description: Powered by our AI Multi-Agent System that orchestrates data integration, analysis, and strategic communication for radical transparency.

product.title: The Strategic Navigator
product.subtitle: Enterprise EROI platform transforming sustainability integration
product.description: Advanced AI-driven system combining radical transparency with predictive analytics for strategic decision-making in capital-intensive industries.

transparency.title: Unified Workspace
transparency.description: Object-centric navigation with universal Inspector panel providing complete visibility into environmental impact across all business operations.

integration.title: Fluid Interactivity
integration.description: Direct manipulation interfaces with universal cross-filtering enabling seamless integration of ESG factors into traditional financial models.

predictive.title: Relevant Information Density
predictive.description: Progressive disclosure with user-configured dashboards for advanced modeling of regulatory, environmental, and transition risks.

profitability.title: Radical Transparency
profitability.description: ExplanationTree methodology with complete audit trails for achieving superior financial performance through disciplined sustainability practices.

analytics.title: Real-time EROI Analytics
analytics.description: Live data processing and Environmental Return on Investment calculations across multiple data sources with shadow pricing integration.

modeling.title: Advanced Scenario Modeling
modeling.description: Multi-dimensional what-if analysis for strategic planning with predictive risk assessment and compliance forecasting.

compliance.title: Automated Compliance Tracking
compliance.description: Continuous monitoring of regulatory requirements including CSRD, EU Taxonomy, and emerging sustainability frameworks.

product.techStack: Built on FastAPI + Neo4j + React + Gemini AI

about.title: About Humblify
about.subtitle: Pioneering the integration of environmental impact and financial strategy
about.description: We are strategists, engineers, and sustainability experts united by the conviction that radical transparency drives sustainable transformation in capital-intensive industries.
about.mission: To revolutionize strategic decision-making in capital-intensive industries by integrating environmental impact as a core financial metric, enabling superior returns through sustainable practices.
about.vision: A world where every business decision is informed by its true environmental and financial impact, creating a sustainable economy that thrives within planetary boundaries while delivering exceptional shareholder value.

transparency.title: Radical Transparency
transparency.description: We champion complete openness in our technology, methodologies, and business practices. Glass-box AI over black-box solutions.

rigor.title: Scientific Rigor
rigor.description: All methodologies grounded in peer-reviewed research, empirical validation, and continuous improvement through data-driven iteration.

impact.title: Measurable Impact
impact.description: We focus exclusively on solutions that drive quantifiable business outcomes and demonstrable environmental progress.

thinking.title: Long-term Value Creation
thinking.description: We optimize for sustainable competitive advantage and multi-generational value creation over short-term financial metrics.

ceo.background: Former strategy consulting partner specializing in energy transition and capital allocation optimization in heavy industries.

cto.background: Ex-Palantir senior engineer with deep expertise in enterprise data integration, AI orchestration, and analytics platform architecture.

strategy.background: Former investment director at leading climate-tech VC with extensive network in energy, manufacturing, and infrastructure sectors.

science.background: PhD Environmental Economics, former researcher at Stockholm Environment Institute specializing in environmental shadow pricing methodologies.

sales.background: 20+ years enterprise software sales focusing on mission-critical systems for manufacturing, energy, and infrastructure clients.

product.background: Former product leader at B2B analytics platforms with specialization in user experience design for complex data visualization systems.
